title: Start exclusive breastfeeding
content: Breastfeed exclusively for the first 6 months to provide optimal nutrition and immunity.

title: Keep the newborn warm
content: Ensure the baby is kept warm with skin-to-skin contact immediately after birth.

title: Introduce solid foods
content: Begin with mashed vegetables and fruits at 6 months alongside breastfeeding.

title: First measles vaccine
content: Ensure your child receives the measles vaccine at 9 months.

title: Encourage walking
content: Support your child to take first steps with assistance around 12 months.

title: Monitor sleep patterns
content: Ensure 10-12 hours of sleep daily for healthy growth at this age.

title: Promote oral health
content: Brush teeth twice daily with fluoride toothpaste starting at 2 years.

title: Balanced diet for growth
content: Provide a variety of foods including vegetables, fruits, and proteins daily.
